vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπαθροίζομαι,
passive, assemble besides, [NT+1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to increase; to be collected collect
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to increase; to be collected collect
act., to gather together, to collect close upon, or beside; pas., to crowd upon, Lk. 11:29*
